isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - IC BUS SERVICE MANUAL - FLOOR COVERING

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE
svcproc.para: Regular cleaning and proper maintenance will prolong the life of the floor covering material. The floor should be inspected and swept daily. The floor should be mopped with a mild detergent weekly. Do not use a harsh detergent, excessive amount of water or sweeping compound. A general purpose floor conditioner will seal and maximize floor appearance and life. This procedure will cut down on dirt build up and eliminate premature deterioration of the floor covering.
